title: Princess Beatrice is already a 'fantastic step-mummy', reveals friend
text:
Princess Beatrice is already a 'fantastic step-mother' and has 'embraced' her fiancé's toddler son, it has been reported.

The royal, 31, is said to enjoy a good relationship with fiancé Edo Mapelli Mozzi's two-year-old son Christopher Woolf, whom he shares with his ex-fiancée Dara Huang, 37.

Speaking to People, a friend claimed bride-to-be Beatrice is a 'fantastic step-mummy'.

Princess Beatrice, 31, is said to have 'embraced' fiance Edo Mapelli Mozzi's, 36, two-year-old son and is already a 'fantastic step mother', according to a friend

Edo shares a two-year-old son Christopher Woolf with former fiance architect Dara Huang, 37,

'Edo is easily one of the best dads, he is so involved, and Beatrice is already showing that she’s a fantastic step-mummy,' the magazine reported.

It added: 'They’ve been on family vacations together [with his son]. They are really happy.'

Italian property developer Edo, 36, and Beatrice announced their engagement last week after 11 months of dating.

Edo is understood to have still be living with Dara when he and Beatrice - who are longtime family friends - started dating, although the couple were separated.

A close family friend said Edo and Dara had split up six months before he got together with Beatrice in October 2018.

Last night the couple were seen for the first time in London since announcing their engagement in September

It appears Edo, Beatrice and Dara are united in wanting the best for Christopher.

Last week, Dara told MailOnline: 'I wish the best for Edo and Beatrice and look forward to uniting our families.'

Beatrice and Edo were seen for the first time since announcing their engagement on Monday night in London, where they attended the launch of new Dior book at the designer's London store.

Announcing Beatrice and Edoardo's engagement, a Buckingham Palace statement read: 'We are extremely happy to be able to share the news of our recent engagement.

'We are both so excited to be embarking on this life adventure together and can't wait to actually be married.

'We share so many similar interests and values, and we know that this will stand us in great stead for the years ahead, full of love and happiness.'
description: Princess Beatrice is said to enjoy a good relationship with fiancé Edo Mapelli Mozzi's two-year-old son Christopher Woolf, whom he shares with his ex-fiancée Dara Huang, 37.
